about.title: About Us
about.intro: is a digital devotional platform created to connect devotees with verified pandits, puja services, bhajan events, and religious products. Rooted in the spiritual culture of Braj (Mathura‚ÄìVrindavan), we aim to simplify your spiritual journey online.
about.mission: We strive to revive and digitize traditional religious practices so that every devotee‚Äîregardless of location‚Äîcan book pujas, attend bhajans, and seek divine blessings effortlessly.
about.founder: This platform was founded by Jay Rana, a Computer Science engineer with deep devotion toward spiritual values and Indian traditions. With a passion for combining tech and tradition, he built this full-stack platform for all spiritual needs.

vision.point1: Digitize all rituals, bhajans, and bookings.
vision.point3: Offer verified pandits with transparency & respect.
vision.point4: Enable easy access to pujas even from abroad.

hero.description: We provide highly qualified and experienced Panditjis for all communities ‚Äî Gujarati, Rajasthani, Marathi, Sindhi, Bihari, Bengali, and Punjabi.

pujaServices.title: Diwali Pooja
pujaServices.description: Diwali is the festival of Laxmi, the Goddess of prosperity and wealth. People perform special puja to invite Her into their homes. Invite prosperity by booking a traditional Laxmi-Ganesh Puja.

pujaServices.title: Navgraha Shanti
pujaServices.description: Navgraha Shanti is performed to appease nine celestial bodies (Navagrahas). It brings peace, prosperity, and harmony by reducing planetary doshas.

pujaServices.title: Rudrabhishek - Lord Shiva Ritual
pujaServices.description: Rudrabhishek is a powerful ritual to worship Lord Shiva. It removes negativity and grants health, prosperity, and spiritual growth.

famous_places.heading: Explore All Famous Places
famous_places.scroll_to_load: Scroll down to load more places...

description.place1: Banke Bihari Temple is located in Biharipura in Vrindavan Dham in Mathura district in India. It is one of the ancient and famous temples of India.
description.place2: The Radha Barsana Temple is dedicated to Radha, the consort of Krishna, and is one of the most important pilgrimage sites.
description.place3: Prem Mandir was constructed by Jagadguru Kripalu Maharaj and dedicated to Radha Krishna.
description.place4: ISKCON Vrindavan is also called Sri Krishna Balaram Mandir, one of the major ISKCON temples.
description.place5: Char Dham Mandir is dedicated to the four sacred sites: Yamunotri, Gangotri, Kedarnath, and Badrinath.
description.place6: This temple is dedicated to Lord Ranganath (form of Vishnu) and built in South Indian architectural style.
description.place7: The Krishna Janmasthan Temple Complex is a group of Hindu temples in Mathura, believed to be the birthplace of Lord Krishna.
description.place8: Radha Raman Temple is one of the oldest in Vrindavan, established by Gopala Bhatta Goswami in 1542 CE.
description.place9: Radha Vallabh Temple, one of the oldest in Vrindavan, is dedicated to Radha and Krishna.
description.place10: Nidhivan is a sacred grove associated with divine pastimes of Krishna with Radha and gopis.
description.place11: One of the seven ancient temples in Vrindavan, established by Gaudiya Vaishnavas.
description.place12: This temple is the oldest in Vrindavan and associated with Sanatana Goswami.
